Title: Rodney Fickle Online Athlete
Actors: Isaac Moody, Ben Williams, Kane Sarota, Ariana Dickson
Plot: Rodney Fickle, a young man with a dead end job and a love life to match decides that it's time that he did something with his life. Follow Rodney as he chases his dream of leaving his 9-to-5 day job to become a professional video gamer.
